message: In front of the lady's room.
Looks like you were still waiting for me, and I can see light spilling out from the crack in the door.

name: Jonathan
message: Mr. Hudson......Sorry I'm late.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Are you Swift？
Please, come on in.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Is your body doing alright now？
When Gardner and Thomas brought you in, I was totally shocked.

name: Jonathan
message: Sorry for making you worry‥‥‥‥‥‥‥
I'm totally fine now.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Oh, that's a relief.

name: Jonathan
message: I feel bad for what I did to those two.
Didn't you say something？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: You two didn't do anything.
Cordelia seemed really worried about you.

name: Jonathan
message: I ended up showing you how pathetic I am.
Normally, I can handle most things just fine......

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: You don't need to worry about it anymore.
Anyway, how about some tea？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Or would you like some alcohol？
I　have　a　little　bit　of　port　or　brandy,　though.

name: Jonathan
message: No, really, I'm fine. Thanks for your kindness.
Do you drink alcohol, Mr. Hudson?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: It's just a little bit.
Just a little nightcap before bed, that's all it is.
The wine bottle placed on the table-is it the one the lady loves to drink?
I've never heard that the lady likes to drink...
And looking at the label, it seems like a pretty expensive brandy.
Even if she does drink a little, would a woman really drink something like that?
Normally, it's usually something like sherry or wine.
So, does that mean there's a guy who drank alcohol in this room？
It looks like it was just recently opened, and the Bottle is still more than half full.
The room was as plain as ever, with nothing that gave any sense of Mrs. Hudson's personality.
Judging by the fact that the fireplace is packed full of firewood, it looks like the lady doesn’t plan on resting anytime soon.
Could it be that you've been waiting for me all this time, expecting that I would come to your room?
For some reason, it looks like her eyes are a little watery.
There's a seductive vibe coming from her that you could never imagine from her usual self.
What the hell is with this sudden change?
You've never acted this defenseless in front of me before.
The lady is staring at me intently.
She probably doesn’t mean it that way, but I end up feeling like a cheating husband or a kid who did something bad.
Even though she should be tired from working at the Fish Scale Inn during the day, she doesn't show any sign of it at all.
The way she seems a bit shadowed-I don't really know, but maybe that's something unique to widows.

Changing from her rather plain, if anything, stiff-looking work clothes to a neat but mature dress, her demeanor shifts from distant politeness to a casual attitude like a real sister being friendly to her little brother.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: I'm jealous of Cordelia.

name: Jonathan
message: Doing all that just for Cordelia.
Was she someone special?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: ダゴンに属する人達はコーデリアを『巫女』だって　　　　　　　　　言っているみたいね、本人は何も知らないでしょう　　　　　　　　　けど。

name: Jonathan
message: What does 'miko' mean？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Well, I don't know either.
If you take it literally, that would mean Cordelia is an important figure in the Dagon Cult...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Honestly, doesn't it just mean she was raised at the church for a short while?

name: Jonathan
message: Is that really all there is......
That guy Nai, I have no clue what he's thinking.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Are you that worried？

name: Jonathan
message: Of course I am.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: I'm jealous of Cordelia.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: There are people who really worry about me.
But,　I　don't　think　you　need　to　worry　about　it　too　much,　because　that's　just　how　it　is,　right？

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: そんなに大切な娘だとしたら、誰かがコーデリアに　　　　　　　　　悪さでもしよう物ならただでは済まないでしょうか　　　　　　　　　らね。

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: If only you had come to this village sooner...
I wonder what she means.
No way, Hudson... just like Thomas said...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Sorry for saying something weird.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: それで、何のお話でしたかしら？

name: Jonathan
message: It's about Cordelia.
I was supposed to talk about what she was like when she was brought to Arkham.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Ah, that's right.
あの娘がアーカムに来たのは、わたくしがここに来　　　　　　　　　るほんの数年前だったはずです。

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Was the first time we met when you came to eat at the Fish Scale Inn together with your spouse？

name: Jonathan
message: How was Cordelia acting at that time？
Do you remember anything unusual?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Yeah, I hadn't ever met an Oriental until then.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: I just got completely absorbed watching out of curiosity.
That girl didn't seem very happy, did she.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: After　all,　the　couple　had　never　had　a　child　before,　so　they　probably　didn’t　know　how　to　handle　it.

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia doesn't even seem to remember that time.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Because the couple suddenly went missing one morning, it must have been a huge shock for such a young girl.

name: Jonathan
message: What happened to her after her foster parents disappeared？
Someone had to take care of it, right?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: The Dagon Church was taking care of her.
At that time, Cordelia was in a state of mental confusion from the shock.

name: Jonathan
message: Cordelia at the Church of Dagon？
So　that's　why　she　hated　going　to　that　Church.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: コーデリアはその事を覚えていないでしょう。
After that, everyone worked together to rebuild Gilman House so that she could become independent.

name: Jonathan
message: So basically, Fish Scale Inn and the general store don't sell booze...

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: That's not all, they shut down every other tavern around here too.

name: Jonathan
message: How could you do something like that.
It's not like everyone in the village is a follower of Dagon, right?

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Those shops weren’t run by people from this village, so I guess they just paid them enough money to get them to leave.

name: Jonathan
message: Mr. Hudson......

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: No way, you already belong to Cordelia.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Hurry up and go to that girl's place.
From how things looked during the day, it seemed like they were really worried about you.
Mrs. Hudson isn't resisting at all, just letting me do as I please.
Could this possibly be......

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: What's the matter, Mr. Swift？

name: Jonathan
message: Jonathan is fine, Hudson.
Without trying to push me away, Mrs. Hudson just looks at my hand over hers, seeming to be deep in thought about something.

name: Mrs. Hudson
message: Is there something you want to talk about？
If you don't hurry, the sun will come up.
Thomas's room
